channel.title: [508] IBOff [Almost a true 508]
channel.description:
[size=12pt][b]Base[/b][/size] - SB508 V3.2
Recently over the last month, a buddy and me decided to create a server using a default Run off of Palidino's base, SB508. This base is pretty clean, has combat started, and npc combat is pretty bare.
Whenever I go on a 508 server, it's usually the same thing: (Turmoil, Torva, Chaotics, etc..) None of these servers have an economy (my opinion), too lazy to fix the simplest bugs.
[size=18pt][b]July 5, 2011[/b][/size] [b]Barrows:[/b] - Have to find the random door to enter the chest room, can't just simply enter the chest room. - If you find the wrong door, you get hit with 7hp. - Once you open the chest, you have 1/5 chances of getting a barrows item. - The amount of items you get depends on your Kill Count. (Blood runes, chaos runes, death runes, and coins) - Earthquake Starts when you open chest. - Hit by falling rocks randomly every 3-12 seconds. (Hits from 5-19 HP)
- //TODO: Arrows above head, and fixing NPC Force chat.
[size=16pt][b]July 1, 2011[/b][/size] -Bank noting/unoting is working -Changed around 100 prices -Added mapdata for chaos tunnels (Planning to add it...Lord help me..)
[size=14pt][b]June 30, 2011[/b][/size] -Starting Magic on NPC -Working Multi barrage/Blitz on NPCS
[size=12pt][b]June 29, 2011[/b][/size] -Finishiing Smelting
-Finishing up Herblore -Added Pestle and Mortar [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/14390y.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]June 28, 2011:[/b][/size] -Redoing Herblore -90% Completed, below is a picture of what I've done today...took like 3 hours getting all the Ids/Levels/XP rates/Doses [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2nlxqaw.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]June 25-27, 2011:[/b][/size] -Created a Quest engine. (Mainly Npc Dialogue) -Ran around to various places and adding mapdata (Added Yanille Dungeon) -Added Edgeville/Varrock dungeon with npcs that have correct npc animation/max hits/correct drops -Started on the town of Yanille.
What we plan to do? I'll just show a list of what we are doing.
1. No quest tab teleports 2. Skills take longer than 30 minutes to get to 100 3. Major Economy (Have to kill npcs for good armor, etc) 4. Admins cannot do ::item 5. Hopefully all 24 skills working 6. Fully working towns, which include: a. Falador (Including Falador Mine/Mining Guild) b. Varrock c. Al-Kharid & Shantay Pass d. Draynor Village & Draynor Maynor e. Lunar Isle (The boat, Lunar Mines) f. Port Sarim g. Lumbridge What does it mean when I say fully working? Well, you can travel anywhere in these towns, all ladders work/doors, etc.
7. We literally do not have anything in Player.Process(); The only things that are in there are mainly Player/Object option handlers. 8. Perfect Hybrid Switching
Bet you're curious of the features that we've added.. Well, here's a sneak peak.
Bank Tabs (I know, every server has it haha)
[img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/6773/banktabs.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Woodcutting[/b][/size] - Tree turns into stump after a random amount of time. - Each tree has a delay changing from stump to regular tree. - Need to find the correct stump id for each tree. [img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/4731/woodcuttingf.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Mining[/b][/size] - Mine a rock, turns into a bare rock, can't mine it. - Need to find all empty rock Ids -.- [img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/9360/miningc.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Teleports[/b][/size] - Necklaces & rings are working, just need to add a delete Item/get Item method... - Changing the delay, just showing for Lols [img]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/6303/teleports.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Smelting[/b][/size] - Ring of Forging is added - 50% chance of losing iron if not equipping ring of forging - Not finished -.- [img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/773/smelting.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Fletching[/b][/size] - Ignore the longbow/shortbows, they've been changed to (u) - Adding more features later, only have the knife on log fully functional. [img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/8701/fletch.png[/img] Chaning short/longbows to short (u)s and Longbow (u) cause you can make bow string now..
[img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/4549/lookds.png[/img] Alot more, just don't feel like uploading 8 pictures..
[size=12pt][b]Summoning[/b][/size] - All buttons are working, required items, etc. - Need to finish pouch summoning/interface configs -.- - 1 - 3 Charm drop rate per npc randomly [img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/4263/summoningb.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Herblore[/b][/size] - Making Unf Potions (Completed) - Making Finished Potions (Completed) - Cleaning Herbs - TODO: Need to add Pestle and mortar
[size=12pt][b]Fishing[/b][/size] - Fishing spots move about after so much time - Still in beta testing
[size=12pt][b]Slayer[/b][/size] - Working slayer points shop - Working Task Removal - Just need to fix npc Dialogue -.- - Around 100 Slayer Tasks (not joking -.-)
[size=12pt][b]RuneCrafting[/b][/size] - full abyss Runecrafting - Working Pouches - Spirit Graahk added - Need to do talisman on altar, blah blah stuffs - Working multiple runes (not using rs multiplier)
[size=12pt][b]Crafting[/b][/size] - Dragon leather crafting - Soft/Hard Leather Crafting - Spinning wheel added - Gem Crafting - Working Jewellery crafting in furnace, just need a frames method to remove childId's to get rid of the moulds
[size=12pt][b]Thieving[/b][/size] - Working stalls, give out the correct items (Ex: Gem stall gives 1 of 4 random gems) - Need to make the stall disappear upon thieving it - Working pickpocketing (Pickpocket npc, gives reward, working sounds) - If fail pickpocketing, player gets hit/Stunned and cannot pickpocket for 5 seconds [IMG]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/7343/thievingi.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Misc.[/b][/size] - Skilling tab with interface - Pots (super att,str, etc) - Working trade x/remove x, withdraw x/deposit x - Shops (Don't glitch when more than 1 player uses a different shop at same time) - Almost 5 completed RS Towns - 30+ shops all around - If a player has 2b in their bank, and wishes to deposit 200m, it will send a message and stop them from nulling their cash. - If a player has 2b in their inventory and withdraws 200m, it will not let them.
[size=12pt][b]XP Rates[/b][/size] - Most of the skills range from 15x-20x RS Rates. Except RuneCrafting, which is 40x
[size=12pt][b]Client Sided / Website sided Features[/b][/size] - Webclient with auto cache download - Highscores that automatically update - Blackmarks [IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/682/blackmarksf.png[/img]
Server is in beta at the moment, is being placed online in the next few days for economy tests. See you soon :)

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No, that’s random information the client gives, it has that for almost all client errors. The only way to get Mapdata was to run this program on REAL runescape during the 508 revision, which saved the map data from the server to your computer.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] IBOff [Almost a true 508]
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

So where would the mapdata that I put in be at?

This is what came up when there was no mapdata:

Error: Class68_Sub13_Sub15:259 PacketParser:747 Class14:33 Class90:143 client:786 Applet_Sub1:693 Applet_Sub1:156 Thread:680 | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 | T2 - 142,252,99 - 0,2654,2599 -

Would these numbers be the mapdatas?
T2 - 142,252,99 - 0,2654,2599 -

Edit: Wait, so I think the 0,2654,2599 are the coordinates.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] IBOff [Almost a true 508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Nah.

There are two versions that do the same thing, one is having a bunch of different files, usually one per map data, and the other one of them is a packed file (usually called 1.dat) that has all of the same information put into one file.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] IBOff [Almost a true 508]
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

[quote=“zack_flowers, post:16, topic:400457”][quote author=† Kane † link=topic=497532.msg3644892#msg3644892 date=1309302236]
I like how you put the right interfaces for fletching and crafting.

How do you add mapdata?
[/quote]

When I teleport to places that do not contain mapdata, it prompts me the name of the file that I’m missing, For example(12001.txt) I look through all the mapdata that I have (3000+ files) and add them in 1 by 1…Not the proper way to do it, but it gets the job done. And I’m not missing many files, so adding them 1 by 1 doesn’t take long. Only doing this for dungeon areas.

Q: Why don’t you just add all 3000 files into your mapdata then?
A: Some of the files contain - Integers and cause the server to crash upon log in.

Q: How did you get 3000+ Files?
A: Google[/quote]

So you only have to put the mapdata file with the correct name, you don’t have to put anything in the file? And how did you get your server to do that?

Read full topic

item.title: [508] IBOff [Almost a true 508]
item.dc:creator: @zack_flowers zack_flowers
item.description:
@zack_flowers wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:5, topic:400457”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=497532.msg3638545#msg3638545 date=1308779977]
I think you have one of the best fishing bases I have seen for 508 good job.
[/quote]How can you say that without seeing how it actually works? All we know is that he added the random spot movements (which is in NPCSpawn.cfg) and a few different item ids for different spots. I’d like to see how it’s handled before I jump to any conclusions.

OT - Can I see how you handle fletching? I mean I already have it but I’m curious (you don’t see many that have the interface working)

Few things I like about this are the mining and woodcutting depletions, most sources don’t have that. I mean it’s not hard to do but it’s nice to actually see it done.[/quote]

The fletching we are using is handled in a 3d array… Could be done better, but hey, it works More proud of my thieving, took longer -.-

Read full topic

item.title: [508] IBOff [Almost a true 508]
item.dc:creator: @bamdude37 bamdude37
item.description:
@bamdude37 wrote:

“The moving spots is just NPCSpawn.cfg like I said, which isn’t actually part of the skill.”

Uhh no, if it was handled in that file the fishing spot would just start drifting away, and that would look retarded. Each time the Fishing spot is created, it is assigned a random number (less than 50) of fish it is allowed to distribute. Once that number is reached (a separate integer holds the amount of fish a spot has distributed), the spot goes away, and another spot is created nearby using the same rules.

Update:
Added an Admin CP to create offense profiles and add/remove offenses from a specified account profile.
Added a moderator CP to view offenses of a specified account profile.

Read full topic
